LSVT Global offers world-class continuing education courses for speech, physical and occupational therapists globally in our evidence-based and effective treatments for Parkinson's, pediatrics, and other populations. These foundational therapies are grounded in over 30 years of scientifically validated research. Our newest course, LSVT LOUD for KIDS, is the result of 20 years of research exploring the impact of LSVT LOUD treatment to improve communication in children with motor speech disorders. Join the global network of over 60,000 therapists from 80 countries in our mission to change lives with proven therapies. LSVT LOUD Training and Certification Courses instill confidence through evidence-based speech treatments.  What is different about LSVT LOUD? Unparalleled support for clinicians. Core Benefits Included with your LSVT LOUD Certification: Tools for clients to maintain treatment gains. Inspire hope. Be empowered. Transform lives. The American Speech-Language-Hearing Association (ASHA) is the national professional, scientific, and credentialing association for 228,000 members and affiliates who are audiologists; speech-language pathologists; speech, language, and hearing scientists; audiology and speech-language pathology support personnel; and students.
